name: The Blue Lynx in... Decisions Decisions
name_original: The Blue Lynx in... Decisions Decisions
description:
Every time she fights crime as the Blue Lynx, Erin Steele must make decisions.

Do I sneak into the hideout stealthily?  Or do I burst in, guns blazing?

Do I play the role of cocky, invincible superheroine?  Or put on the guise of a sultry seductress?

Do I ask Margot to stay in the car?  Or does she join me as the Black Bobcat?

Sometimes, the choices are obvious.  Sometimes, they're supremely difficult.

And when you play THE BLUE LYNX: DECISIONS, DECISIONS, they're all yours to make!

DECISIONS DECISIONS is a Choose Your Own Adventure game made with Twine.

In it, you play as-- who else-- the Blue Lynx!

Will you be able to defeat your foes and show the city what crimefighting is all about?  Or will your night end in disaster, death, doom... your secret identity being revealed?

You get to decide!

DECISIONS DECISIONS has almost 50,000 words and contains hundreds of choices.

Your mission can end in nearly fifty ways.  Some of them happy... Most of them, bad.

Play, and play again, to see all of Erin's fates!

For more on the Blue Lynx, please visit: bluelynxandmargot.blogspot.com
